title: Web3 charity, Ubunation, to auction 10,000 NFTs to build a school in Kenya - CoinJournal
description: Ubunation, a web3 charity, has partnered with UNDER Lea's TRUST, a non-profit organization dedicated to enhancing educational access in Kenya, to launch an innovative charitable fundraising campaign where 10,000 NFTs will be auctioned off to support the construction of a primary school in Nairobi.
